      • getValidMovement

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> getValidMovement(java.awt.Point point,
                                                   int[][] matrix,
                                                   int piece)
        Description copied from interface: MoveStrategy
        Method returning an arraylist of valid movements for the specified piece from the specified piece on the specified board.
        Specified by:
        getValidMovement in interface MoveStrategy
        Parameters:
        point - The starting tile.
        matrix - A color matrix representation of the board, 1 being enemy color and -1 being friendly.
        piece - The piece at the starting tile.
        Returns:
        A list of valid movements for the specified piece, board and tile.
